title: Bolt of Draining
data:
{{version030}} {{Flavour|Fires a penetrating bolt of negative energy which drains any living creature it strikes.}} '''Bolt of Draining''' is a monster-only spell which fires a bolt of [[negative energy]], dealing damage and [[draining]] any creatures in its path. For players, energy resistance reduces the damage and draining dealt by this spell by 50% (rN+), 75% (rN++), or 100% (rN+++). Draining can be quite irritating, since it lowers your max HP (until you gain sufficient XP). {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Bolt of Draining |level=5 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Necromancy}} |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of Death]]
|castingnoise=2 |spellnoise=0 }} {{AttackSpell |name=Bolt of Draining |formula = 4d(3.75+Power*3/20) |maxdmg = 4d33 [[negative energy]] |maxsp = 200 |range = 6 |target = Bolt |tohit = 8+Power/20 |special = [[Draining]] |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 8 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 20 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 4 |dam_adder = 15 |dam_num = 3 |dam_denom = 5}} *Prior to [[0.26]], [[drain]]ing reduced skill XP instead of max HP. Also, [[bolt spell]]s had their range reduced by 1 for each target they hit. *Prior to [[0.25]], Bolt of Draining was a level 5 [[Conjurations]]/[[Necromancy]] spell available to players. *Prior to [[0.14]], Bolt of Draining was a level 6 spell.
